text: When I entered this race, I knew I‚Äôd have to deal with attacks and criticism, especially on social media .That‚Äôs just politics and I have thick skin. I‚Äôm stepping away from the best job I‚Äôve ever had as Channel 13‚Äôs Chief Meteorologist to announce I‚Äôm running for the Republican nomination to be New Mexico‚Äôs next United States Senator. As a proud conservative, I believe government‚Äôs job is to protect our freedom and liberty and keep us safe, but for too long Washington has imposed its political will on us. That is not the leadership New Mexico needs today. We can and will make New Mexico an even better place to live and raise our children.  I chose to enter this race because New Mexico deserves a Senator who has not been part of the problem and someone who will always put New Mexico first. I humbly ask for your support and hope you will check out our announcement video and sign up to join us today! www.markronchetti.com/join
